src:
View Photos of 450-HP Chevy E-10 Pickup Concept
06 Nov 2019, 19:35 by Car and Driver











Tech borrowed from the Chevrolet Bolt EV and fitted to a 1962 C-10 brings about a modern take on the hot-rod pickup.

From Car and Driver
